TextLibrary.Text: Ahh, my apologies, the Arboleth was a poor choice.
Ahh, my apologies, the Arboleth was a poor choice.
Ahh, my apologies, the Arboleth was a poor choice.
Ahh, my apologies, the Arboleth was a poor choice.
Once it has defeated me, it would consume my body and I would become part of it. That is not a fitting death for a warrior.

Alright, then. We'll just have to keep looking.
